title: MD
biography: Sanjay Gupta is an American neurosurgeon, medical reporter, and writer. He serves as associate chief of neurosurgery at Grady Memorial Hospital and assistant professor at Emory University School of Medicine.

citations.title: Neurosurgery in the Age of Information

awards.name: Emmy Award
awards.issuingBody: National Academy of Television Arts and Sciences

timeline.title: Neurosurgery Residency at University of Michigan
Covered Iraq War as Embedded Medical Reporter
timeline.description: Performed emergency surgeries on soldiers and Iraqi citizens during the conflict.
